alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:30PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain possibly mixed with sleet. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. Little or no sleet accumulation. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will continue to gradually fall through the night with areas of standing water refreezing and producing black ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
